background.name: Spellfire Initiate
entries: You bear the gift of spellfire: a rare form of magic that channels the raw power of the Weave. Wielding spellfire takes a heavy toll on the body. You’ve trained both mind and body to efficiently wield this sacred power.
You gain the {@feat Spellfire Spark|SPELLFIRE_HOMEBREW} feat.

entries.name: Magic Absorption
entries: Once per turn, when you take damage from a spell or magical effect, you reduce the total damage taken by 1d4. You can’t use this benefit if you have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Spellfire Flame
entries: You learn the {@spell sacred flame} cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell (choose when you gain this feat). You can also cast this cantrip as a Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, regaining all uses when you finish a Long Rest.
